name: Mint Mojo
keywords: garlic, jalapeño, mint, side dish, spring
recipeIngredient: 1 cup tightly packed fresh mint leaves, finely chopped
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: In a saucepan, combine vinegar and mint jelly. Bring to a boil, and simmer until reduced by half, about 10 minutes. Cool.

Add mint, shallots, garlic, jalapeno and vegetable oil. Transfer to a blender, and puree until smooth. Season with salt and pepper. Serve as a condiment for grilled or roasted meats, vegetables or poultry.
